# `ConversationFormResponseComponent` Definition

A response component from a form

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | Yes | The id of the component in the original message. |
| component | [`ConversationFormResponseContent`](conversationformresponsecontent-definition.md) | Yes | The content object capturing component response from the original message. |
